attributes.action: Restore services on the Brighton Main Line, Gatwick Express and West Coastway Lines to levels that offer its patrons an acceptable level of service prior to the introduction of the Winter 2008 timetable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following Southern Railways and the Department of Transports destruction of the peak rail services between Brighton, East Croydon and Clapham Junction including evening connecting services for the West Coastway line we urge action in reconsidering the changes that have been implemented.
